channel.title: CVE Feed for Magic Post Voice -- Magic Post Voice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Magic Post Voice -- Magic Post Voice

item.title: CVE-2021-39315|2024-09-16T19:52:29.283Z -- magic%20post%20voice -- magic%20post%20voice
item.description: The Magic Post Voice WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ids parameter found in the ~/inc/admin/main.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.2.
